name: Tax Evasion Simulator
description:
Made for the Spring 22 Salisbury Game Jam! Also because of school we did it in like <5 hours don't judge. Good Luck!

-----------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Left Click - Shoot ($10)

WASD - Movement ($1)

R - Restart (Not allowed)

Escape - Quit (But you can't escape taxes)

-----------------------------------------------------------

Made by Justin McGrath and Tyler Strumsky
